ValidationRule.description: If "Created from opportunity" = TRUE, then Account and Contact may not be updated (manually by a user)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( EU_Createdfromopportunity__c = True, EU_BypassValidation__c = False, OR ( ISCHANGED( EU_Contact__c ) , ISCHANGED( EU_Account__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change this participant manually, please update this info in the Opportunity itself.
